definitions: To look at all parts of (something) carefully in order to detect some feature.
To pass a scanner over or across (a surface or object) in order to produce an image or detect something.
To read through (material) quickly to find a particular point or points.
To analyze the meter of (a line of verse).
examples: She was scanning the horizon for ships.
The machine is scanning the document.
He was scanning the newspaper for job ads.
The student was scanning the poem.
